%title Git

== Git Config ==

* The user account information has been saved
{{{
cd existing-project
git init
git add --all
git commit -m "Initial Commit"
git remote add origin htt_ps://....git
git push -u origin master
}}}

* Config
{{{
git config core.ignorecase false
}}}

* Cancel local modifications
git discard all local changes/commits
{{{
git reset --hard origin/master
}}}

* Configure the commit user name and mailbox
$git config --global user.name "your-name"
$git config --global user.email your-email
